original_text: Indeed, under the law almost everything is purified with blood, and without the shedding of blood there is no forgiveness of sins.
korean_text: 율법을 따라 거의 모든 물건이 피로써 정결하게 되나니 피흘림이 없은즉 사함이 없느니라

sentences.original_text: under the law almost everything is purified with blood,
sentences.korean_translation: 율법 아래에서 거의 모든 것이 피로 정결케 되고,

sentences.original_text: and without the shedding of blood
there is no forgiveness of sins.
